message: This is my first offer. I think it's fair, but I'm open to negotiation.
I think you were being too generous in your first offer. I'm making a more modest proposal this time.
Let's try to split the money more evenly. I think 60/40 is a fair compromise.
I'm not willing to give you the majority of the money, but I'm willing to compromise on the 60/40 split. This is a slightly better offer for me.
